name: Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Face Masks
about: What it is:A compostable collection of targeted face masks with a second-skin effect for optimum absorption..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Acne and Blemishes, Oiliness.Formulation:Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: For quick and lasting hydration..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan..What Else You Need to Know:These vegan face masks hydrate, visibly boost radiance, mattify, and soothe skin with hyaluronic acid and a cocktail of plant ingredients. The masks are formulated with 95 percent natural-origin ingredients: coconut nourishes and soothes, matcha tea mattifies and targets pores, lychee provides moisture and glow, watermelon quenches skin and delivers a plumping effect, blueberry visibly perfects skin and boosts radiance, and lemon purifies and clarifies..Clinical Results:Lychee: In a scientific test performed on 10 volunteers:
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: For quick and lasting hydration...Aqua (Water), Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-6 Stearate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydrogenated Ethylhexyl Olivate, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Polyglyceryl-6 Behenate, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Polyacrylate, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sorbitan Caprylate, Glycolipids, Lecithin, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, O-Cymen-5-Ol, Gardenia Taitensis Flower......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Unfold the sheet mask..-Apply mask to clean, dry skin..-Leave the sheet mask on the face for ten minutes before removing..-No need to rinse. .-Avoid contact with eyes. .-Use twice weekly...Tip: .-Massage in any remaining serum using the Sephora Collection Rose Quartz Facial Roller (sold separately)...Recycling Instructions:.-The pouch is made with 16 percent recycled plastic and can be recycled. .-The sheet mask is compostable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m new to the face mask world, but when I tell you Iu2019m hook, I am HOOKED. If I could, I would buy the entire supply of the Coconut nourishing and smoothing masks. My skin tends to be on the drier said, but in some areas Iu2019m oily. Iu2019m on prescription tretinoin so Iu2019m always on the hunt out for the best soothing, moisturizing products. The masks smells DIVINE, and the best part is that the mask is saturated with creamy product, which may be overwhelming at first, but once you put it on your face, I work the extra product into my skin under the mask. Then I scoop the rest out from the package and use it on my neck and hands! Itu2019s so good that it will now be part of my  self care rituals to help with my anxiety. I always put my masks and eye masks in the fridge because nothing is more soothing to me that an ice cold face mask. It helps calm my skin and soothes my soul! With my cold face mask on, lying in bed with a fan directly on me, and some good spa music, with maybe a sprinkle of a substance that helps calm your mindu2026and shew, ainu2019t nobody will be able to tell me nothin! Iu2019ll be on another planet. Itu2019s that good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I experienced the worse contact dermatitis when using this blueberry face mask! My face, including my eyes are swollen and puffy not to mention how much my face burned and was itchy! The last time I had a similar allergic reaction was when I used Kosas foundation. After I had reaction to Kosas foundation, I went to allergist to figure out what I was allergic to and one item (along with nickel and latex) was u201cfragranceu201d ingredient, including Limonene which is a common ingredient used for fragrance smell that many people are allergic to. The allergist also informed me that ingredients with fruit or floral extracts are also a type of fragrance ingredient. Additionally, when the ingredient just list u201cfragrance/parfumu201d as an ingredient, this could be a combination on hundreds or chemicals that can cause an allergic reaction. The crazy thing is that Iu2019m not allergic to many of my other fragrance products, including actual perfume so itu2019s just so frustrating having contact dermatitis and when companies donu2019t list ALL chemical compounds when they list fragrance/ parfum as an ingredient. Not everyone may have the same reaction that I had, but just wanted to warn those that are also allergic to the ingredient u201cfragrance/parfumu201dand prone to allergic reactions to cosmetics/skin care products.

reviews.review_title: This will change the life of your face!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me share with you how I initially thought this was a stroke of luck. Back in August, I experienced a severe breakout caused by a vitamin I had taken, and I received recommendations to try various products, including some highly popular ones, in an attempt to regain control over my skin. Typically, I don't struggle with breakouts; I might get one or two around my menstrual cycle, but overall, my skin remains clear. However, enduring several weeks of daily breakouts was starting to wear down my enthusiasm for maintaining good skincare.  It's worth mentioning that I prefer a straightforward skincare routine and don't fuss much about it. I had these Blueberry Masks sitting around for months. Then, one day, after trying numerous products with no visible results, I decided to give this Blueberry Mask a try. I applied it to my face and went to sleep with it on. To my astonishment, when I woke up, it seemed like every single bump on my face had vanished. I was truly taken aback.  The very next day, I rushed back to Sephora and purchased two more of these Blueberry Masks just to confirm that it was indeed the mask making this remarkable difference. Once again, I followed the same routine u2013 washed my face, applied the Blueberry Mask, went to sleep u2013 and woke up with even fewer acne issues than I had the night before. In fact, I can now count the remaining bumps on one hand, whereas before, I couldn't even keep track of how many I had.  My only suggestion is that this incredible product should be transformed into a serum, and it would be fantastic if you offered it in a multi-pack for sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin & an obsession with all things blueberry, so I decided to try that one. Itu2019s okay! The mask stayed in place decently enough & was refreshing. My skin absorbed the product well & it felt nice. There was enough leftover serum in the package to moisturize my arms AND legs too, so thatu2019s a great bonus. lol It smells nice & says itu2019s 95% natural (which I truly appreciate), BUT, it doesnu2019t specify if the added fragrance is natural or artificial & thatu2019s a HUGE pet peeve of mine. ANY product containing u201cparfum/fragranceu201d should really state the origins. I wanted to try the lychee next, but wonu2019t be, because I was unable to verify if these contain artificial fragrance, so Iu2019m just assuming they do. If thatu2019s not a concern for you, you might like these, but tbh, I donu2019t think thereu2019s enough beneficial ingredients to make them worth $6 a pop.

reviews.review_text: I personally love using Sheet Masks while traveling and these Sephora Fruit & Plant Extract Sheet Masks are some of my favorites because of their compostable element and ingredients - so you never have to feel guilty about using a Sheet Mask again!  I used the Mattifying & Pore Targeting Sheet Mask on the air plane last week and it left my skin so balanced, hydrated yet not greasy or oily and not over-drying. It was mess-free and very convenient to throw into my carry-on bag and apply when I was ready for a quick pamper session. Highly recommend picking some of these Sephora Sheet Masks up for your next girls night or pamper routine.  So many different Sheet Masks to choose from, youu2019ll be sure to find one for every skin type + concern. Highly recommend stocking up on these Sephora clean Fruit & Plant Extract Sheet Masks. Overall, I enjoyed the mask but Iu2019m not sure I would shell out $6 per mask given how frequently I would use them.
